meanings.definition: Voduns: a group of spirits or deities in the religion of Vodou.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest called upon the voduns for guidance.
meanings.sent2: The voduns are believed to have different powers and responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The voduns must have been busy today with all the prayers they received!
meanings.sent4: The voduns' presence felt like a comforting embrace in the temple.
meanings.sent5: Legends say the voduns can shape-shift into animals to protect their followers.

meanings.definition: Voduns: relating to or characteristic of the Vodun religion.
meanings.sent1: The voduns artifacts displayed in the museum fascinated the visitors.
meanings.sent2: She wore traditional voduns attire to honor her ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The voduns symbols painted on the walls added a mystical touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had a voduns-like intensity when he spoke about his beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic drumming created a voduns atmosphere during the ritual.
